title: List of Women's Draughts-64 World Championship winners
text:
The Women's Draughts-64 World Championship has been organized by the <a href="World%20Draughts%20Federation">World Draughts Federation</a> (FMJD) since 1993 for <a href="Brazilian%20draughts">Brazilian</a> and <a href="Russian%20draughts">Russian</a> <a href="draughts">draughts</a>. The first and almost other championships was held in Russian draughts. In Brazilian draughts was held championship in 2007 and in 2018.
Since 2003 took place Draughts-64 World Championship in formats blitz (3 min + 2 sec) and rapid (7 min + 5 sec) also.
